scenario_text.value: There... It’s Kaito!

We’re completely surrounded...
Don’t give up on me now, Dracmon!
Of course. I’m raring to go over here!
Awright, let’s take ’em out!

Takuma! Kaito’s planning to bum-rush them
from the looks of it!

We can’t take that many head-on, Kaito!
It’s too risky! Our strength won’t hold out!
Come back, Kaito!!!

Don’t, Miu! You’ll get caught up if you get
too close!
But if I don’t do anything, Kaito’s gonna—!
Brother, please! Listen to what I’m saying!
You punks! Get out of my waaay!
Oh no, he can’t even hear Miu...!

Kaito! Miu’s here!
Didn’t you want to protect her?!
URAAAAAAAAAH!
It’s no use! We can’t stop him!
Takuma! We have to fight, too!

Jeez... Yeah, you’re right. We’ve got to back
up Kaito and Dracmon!
Aaaaaaaaaugh!!!

You okay, Syakomon?!
Hold it together!!!
Miu?! Stay away from here!!!
Grrrwwwlll...!

(Oh no! A bunch of enemies appeared around
her all of a sudden!)

No way... We’re surrounded...
Ah, ahh... Are we done for...?

No! Kaito, save me! Someone...
Someone save me!
Damn! If I can at least save Miu...!
GRAAAAAAAAAAAAH!
I won’t let that happen!
Miu! I’m coming to save you!
